title: Questions? We Have Answers
description: Find quick answers to the most common questions about our services

items.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
items.answer: You can schedule directly through our website, quickly and easily. We recommend booking in advance to secure your preferred time, especially on weekends.

items.question: Can I book for the same day?
items.answer: Yes! We accept same-day appointments, subject to availability. Visit our website to check available time slots in real-time.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept cash, debit and credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Elo), and PIX. All payment methods are processed securely.

items.question: Do I need to pay in advance?
items.answer: No advance payment is required. Payment is made after the service is completed, when you check out.

items.question: How do I cancel or reschedule my appointment?
items.answer: You can cancel or reschedule directly through our website, in the 'My Appointments' section. Please notify us at least 2 hours in advance to avoid the cancellation fee.

items.question: Is there a cancellation fee?
items.answer: Cancellations made more than 2 hours in advance are free. Cancellations within 2 hours of the scheduled time or no-shows are subject to a fee of 50% of the service value.

items.question: What is your most popular service?
items.answer: Our Complete Combo (Haircut + Beard + Eyebrows) is the most requested! It offers a complete and impeccable look, lasting approximately 60 minutes.

items.question: How long does each service take?
items.answer: A simple haircut takes about 30 minutes, a full beard trim 20 minutes, and the complete combo approximately 60 minutes. Times may vary depending on service complexity.

items.question: Do you serve children?
items.answer: Yes! We serve clients of all ages. We have experience with children's haircuts and create a welcoming environment for the little ones.

items.question: Should I bring a reference photo?
items.answer: It's not mandatory, but it's very helpful! If you have a photo of the haircut or style you want, bring it on your phone. This helps our professionals understand exactly what you're looking for.
